sourcesContent:
<template>
	<!-- 	<el-row :gutter="24">
		<el-col :span="8"> -->
	<el-tabs>
		<el-tab-pane label="General">
			<el-card class="box-card">
				<el-form label-position="right" label-width="250px">
					<el-form-item v-bind:title="url" label="Request URL:">
						<el-button>{{ RequestURL }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
					<el-form-item label="Request Method:">
						<el-button>{{ RequestMethod }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
					<el-form-item label="Status Code:">
						<el-button>{{ StatusCode }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
					<el-form-item label="Remote Address:">
						<el-button>{{ RemoteAddress }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
					<el-form-item label="Referrer Policy:">
						<el-button>{{ ReferrerPolicy }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
				</el-form>
			</el-card>
		</el-tab-pane>
		<el-tab-pane label="Request Headers">
			<el-card class="box-card">
				<el-form label-position="right" label-width="250px">
					<el-form-item v-for="(value, key) in requestHeaders" v-bind:key="key" v-bind:label="key + ':'">
						<el-button>{{ value }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
				</el-form>
			</el-card>
		</el-tab-pane>
		<el-tab-pane v-if="RequestParams" label="Request Params">
			<el-card class="box-card">
				<el-form label-position="top" label-width="250px">
					<el-form-item label="Request Params:">
						<el-input type="textarea" :autosize="{ minRows: 10, maxRows: 15}" placeholder="" v-model="RequestParams">
						</el-input>
					</el-form-item>

				</el-form>
			</el-card>
		</el-tab-pane>
		<el-tab-pane label="Response Headers">
			<el-card class="box-card">
				<el-form label-position="right" label-width="250px">
					<el-form-item v-for="(value, key) in responseHeaders" v-bind:key="key" v-bind:label="key + ':'">
						<el-button>{{ value }}</el-button>
					</el-form-item>
				</el-form>
			</el-card>
		</el-tab-pane>
		<el-tab-pane v-if="ResponseBody" label="Response Body">
			<el-card class="box-card">
				<el-form label-position="top" label-width="250px">
					<el-form-item label="Response Body:">
						<el-input type="textarea" :autosize="{ minRows: 10, maxRows: 15}" placeholder="" v-model="ResponseBody">
						</el-input>
					</el-form-item>
				</el-form>
			</el-card>
		</el-tab-pane>
	</el-tabs>

</template>

<script>
	export default {
		props: ["api"],
		data() {
			return {
				url: "",
				RequestURL: "",
				RequestMethod: "",
				StatusCode: "",
				RemoteAddress: "",
				ReferrerPolicy: "",
				responseHeaders: {},
				requestHeaders: {},
				RequestParams: "",
				ResponseBody: "",
			}
		},
		methods: {
			beautySub(str, len) {
				var reg = /[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/g, //专业匹配中文
					slice = str.substring(0, len),
					chineseCharNum = (~~(slice.match(reg) && slice.match(reg).length)),
					realen = slice.length * 2 - chineseCharNum;
				return str.substr(0, realen) + (realen < str.length ? "..." : "");
			}
		},
		mounted() {
			if (this.api) {
				if(this.api.rawResponse){
					this.StatusCode = this.api.rawResponse.response.status + ' ' + this.api.rawResponse.response.statusText
					this.RemoteAddress = this.api.rawResponse.response.remoteIPAddress
					this.responseHeaders = this.api.rawResponse.response.headers
					
					if (this.api.rawResponse.data) {
						this.ResponseBody = this.api.rawResponse.data.body ? this.api.rawResponse.data.body : false
					}
				}
				
				if(this.api.url){
					this.RequestURL = this.beautySub(this.api.url, 60)
					this.url = this.api.url
				}
				
				if(this.api.rawRequest){
					if(this.api.rawRequest.request){
						this.RequestMethod = this.api.rawRequest.request.method
						this.ReferrerPolicy = this.api.rawRequest.request.referrerPolicy
						this.requestHeaders = this.api.rawRequest.request.headers
					}
				}
				this.RequestParams = this.api.requestParam === "" ? false : this.api.requestParam
			}
		}
	}
</script>

<style>
	.el-form {
		text-align: left
	}
</style>
